pageContext.claim: “But we got all the money we need now. We have everything, we have everything. And you know, the last time -- this last budget they [Democrats] didn't really fight us on the wall. Do you know why? Because they learned it's a really bad issue for them.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump had already grabbed funds designated for schools for the children of U.S. service members and Puerto Rico's recovery from Hurricane Maria to fund the border wall, so there was no great reason for another funding fight in Congress.
